mapper.select: SELECT i.item_num, i.item_brand, i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.item_date, i.item_price, i.item_photo1, i.item_photo1name, i.item_cate, i.item_status, s.item_sizenum, s.item_size FROM item i LEFT OUTER JOIN item_size s ON i.item_cate = s.item_cate WHERE i.item_num=#{item_num}

SELECT s.item_sizenum, i.item_num, max(pb.purchase_price) as purchase_price, s.item_size FROM item_size s LEFT JOIN item i ON s.item_cate = i.item_cate LEFT JOIN purchase_bid pb ON s.item_sizenum = pb.item_sizenum WHERE i.item_num = #{item_num} GROUP BY s.item_sizenum,s.item_size,i.item_num

SELECT s.item_sizenum, i.item_num, min(sb.sale_price) sale_price, s.item_size FROM item_size s LEFT JOIN item i ON s.item_cate = i.item_cate LEFT JOIN sale_bid sb ON s.item_sizenum = sb.item_sizenum WHERE i.item_num = #{item_num} GROUP BY s.item_sizenum,s.item_size,i.item_num
